text: Guatemala competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Eight competitors, all men, took part in ten events in three sports. ==Athletics== Men's 5000 metres *Carlos Cuque López :* Heat -- 15:53.4 (→ did not advance) ==Shooting== One male shooter represented Guatemala in 1972. ;25 m pistol * Víctor Castellanos ==Wrestling== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1972 Summer Olympics 1972 Category:1972 in Guatemalan sport
title: Guatemala at the 1972 Summer Olympics
